titleStmt.title: The Holy Ghost on the bench, other spirits at the bar: or The judgment of the Holy Spirit of God upon the spirits of the times. recorded in Holy Writ. / And reported by Richard Hollinworth ...
titleStmt.author: Hollingworth, Richard, 1607-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.M. for Luke Fawn and are to be sold at his shop, at the signe of the Parrot in Pauls Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: Reproductions of original in the Harvard University Library.

place.placeName: his shop, at the signe of the Parrot in Pauls Churchyard
